profile.title: Developer Profile
profile.body: A detail-oriented developer transitioning from a background in Law, now focused on building fullstack applications with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Proven ability to self-teach and deliver complete projects from concept to deployment. Ready to apply a unique blend of analytical rigor and technical skill to a professional development team.

items.item2: Frontend: React, CSS Modules, Responsive Design, PWAs
items.item3: Backend: Node.js, Express.js, REST APIs, JWT Authentication
items.item5: Tooling & Quality: Git, Zod, ESLint, Prettier, tsx, Helmet, CORS

postgrad.degree: Postgraduate in Analysis and Development of Systems - PUC, 2025
postgrad.focus: Key Skills: Web Standards, UX, Frontend (React), Backend (Node.js), Agile Methodologies

bachelor.degree: Bachelor of Law - Faculdade de Direito de Franca, 2012
bachelor.focus: Key Skills: Analytical reasoning, structured problem-solving, and a meticulous attention to detail

cert1.name: The Complete JavaScript Course: From Zero to Expert

cert4.name: Formação Front-end - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React

cert5.name: iOS & Swift - The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp
